      Limited-edition The New Yorker X J.Crew denim baseball cap

      Black

      To celebrate 100 years of The New Yorker and its legacy of influential journalism, we partnered on an exclusive collection of heritage J.Crew pieces that capture the spirit and style of the iconic cultural institution. Wear this versatile cap made from rugged denim when you need some extra protection from the sun or when you just want something to top off your look.
